title: Characteristics of Greek vase painting-red figure

content.question: The work shown can be attributed to which of the following ancient cultures?

choices.label: Etruscan, because of the use of terra cotta
Egyptian, because of the inclusion of mythological figures
Greek, because of the use of red figure painting
Roman, because of the scenes of warfare

content.answer: Greek, because of the use of red figure painting

topic.text: 2.1: Cultural Contexts of Ancient Mediterranean Art

skill.text: Skill 6.A: Attribute a work of art to a specific artist, culture, art historical style, or object type from the image set.
